Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm Memann, i just uploaded a post about my Let's Play but i saw that 0.18 hasn't really been debated about! So let's begin!!!

I think that they will add 3 more gas giants and 1 dwarf planet (LIKE PLUTO) and about 18 more moons, I suggestion that i thought they could do is Asteroids and Asteroid Belts, making it harder to get to Jool and beyond!, Maybe even near-kerbin, near-duna and near-eve ones that fall into orbit and crash into the planets

What do you think?

Plus my latest video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OCqyesq7mQI&feature=channel&list=UL

0.18 has been amply debated here, but the discussions were closed because there really was nothing more to say and the debate ended up going nowhere. There is no point in speculation about future versions. If you have suggestions, then they go into the Suggestions forum (although they have probably already been suggested).

They will add the features that they decide that they will add. That's about all there is to say.

Edited October 10, 2012 by Nibb31

Well, there has been one thread created shortly after 0.17 was released, and I don't think 0.18 features should be discussed (or guessed, really), and we should wait for an official announcement about this update.

I'm locking this thread, and I ask everyone not to create a new thread about this for the time being, as there will be plenty of time to discuss these features once we know them
